listitem.para: Whether to send requests for the remote peer to redirect IKE/IPsec SA's during IKE_INIT. Valid options are no (the default) and yes. If set, the option global-redirect-to= must also be set to indicate where to redirect peers to. For specific connection redirection after IKE SA authentication, see the redirect= and redirect-to options.
Where to send remote peers to via the global-send-redirect option. This can be an IP address or hostname (FQDN).
